formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Windows Azure.

formElement.label: Storage Account:
formElement.documentation: The name of the storage account that is unique within Windows Azure.

formElement.label: Storage Account Key:
formElement.documentation: The primary access key for the storage account.

formElement.label: Container Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the container. Value can only include lower-case characters.

formElement.label: Blob Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the blob. Value can only include lower-case characters.

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
